alert.note: Alert for Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact southwestern Pender, southeastern Bladen, northeastern Brunswick and northeastern Columbus Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 616 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Montague, or 10 miles north of Leland, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northwest, Sandyfield, Point Caswell, Currie, Long Creek, The Borough, Phoenix, Delco, Montague, Riegelwood and East Arcadia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender
